long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AI-Powered Twitter Replies with One Click

Enhance your Twitter experience with X-Reply, the AI-powered Chrome extension that lets you generate instant Twitter replies with a single click. 

Customize your interactions by setting up prompts for your quick-reply buttons, making every tweet more engaging and personalized.

KEY FEATURES 
üß† AI-Powered Replies: Automatically generate intelligent replies using the OpenAI API based on the content of the tweet.
üìù Custom Quick-Reply Buttons: Set up your own buttons with custom prompts for faster, personalized interactions.
‚úèÔ∏è Improve AI Replies: Fine-tune the AI-generated replies with writing prompts for more polished responses.
üîí Secure API Key Storage: Your OpenAI API key is safely stored in your browser, ensuring complete data privacy.
‚öõÔ∏è Flexible AI Models: Choose from various AI models to tailor the replies to your preferences and needs.

AI-Powered Replies
 - Instant Replies: Generate Twitter replies with one click, saving time and enhancing your interactions.
 - Customizable AI Models: Switch between different AI models or prompts with the click of a button to get the best reply for any conversation.
 - Editable Responses: After generating a reply, easily enhance or modify the content with additional quick-edit options.

Customize Your Prompt Buttons
 - Update and personalize your quick-reply buttons, tailoring each to fit your unique style of communication.

About X-Reply Pro:
We're a dedicated team of five focused on creating powerful and useful Chrome extensions like X-Reply. We value your feedback and are eager to hear from you! If you encounter any issues or have ideas for new features, feel free to leave a comment. We appreciate your support in helping us improve!
